title: Twenty-Odd Ducks: Why, Every Punctuation Mark Counts!
description: Commas and apostrophes aren't the only punctuation marks that can cause big trouble if they're put in the wrong place. Now, Truss and Timmons put hyphens, parentheses, quotation marks, periods, and more in the spotlight, showing how which marks you choose and where you put them can cause hilarious mix-ups.
author: Lynne Truss
